Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory57.jpg'}
{3: 'The game continues on the chessboard.'}
{3: 'The White Knight maintains its advances while the Black pieces defend.'}
{3: 'And now, the Black Knight on C6 and the Rook on A8 are both threatened by the White Queen. Chrome will have to sacrifice one of them.'}
{3: 'The Black side has already lost two Pawns and a Knight.'}
{3: '"So, what will your choice be?"'}
{3: 'Chrome concentrates on the board, knowing that this is a challenge his father set up for him.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "(If I can't come up with the best solution... I won't be able to convince him.)", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "(I won't be able to convince myself.)", 4: '2'}
{3: 'With that thought in mind, he reaches out to the chessboard.'}
{3: 'The holographic chessboard only requires voice inputs to move the pieces, but Chrome decides to pick up the projection of one.'}
{3: 'What he is about to do will put the Rook on the right in a dangerous position.'}
{3: 'The blue glow of the projected piece shimmers between his fingers, and Chrome puts it down firmly on the board.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory20.jpg'}
{3: 'The grenade from the Corrupted lands less than 50 meters away from the base, sending shattered stones across the defense line.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Captain', 3: "Watch your back! Keep your eyes open! Squad One, pay attention to where the Corrupted are! Don't let them cross the defense line!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'This is the last place we can stop them!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Following the captain's command, a few Constructs rush forward and open fire on the approaching Corrupted."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{3: 'A white shadow suddenly flashes by with lightning, catapulting the Corrupted away with the stroke of a scythe.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Stay back! Squad Two Captain, please take your team back to the CPF!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'You are...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Captain Chrome from Strike Hawk! We've cleared the Corrupted from C2 to C4, and we're here to back you up!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'If we retreat now, the Corrupted will take over the area!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "They won't.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'There are facilities from the Post-Pandemic Age in this area. If we lure all the Corrupted here, we can launch an EMP strike.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "But if you don't leave in time, the Constructs will also get affected.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'How do you know about this...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Retreat first! I'll cover you!", 4: '1'}
